@DuncanBannatyne @TheoPaphitis please use your clout to lobby for this. It would get the economy moving quicker than HS2!

@DuncanBannatyne @TheoPaphitis I deliberately set up my business online to avoid extortionate rent and rates. This is an excellent idea!
